name: Four Nights At McDonalds
description:
This game is based on Five Nights At Freddy's! Also I don't own McDonalds! PLEEEEEAAAAAASE don't sue! 

CONTROLS

Move mouse and click stuff. Red buttons open/close doors. White buttons with lightning bolt turn on light. Close doors on enemy's to make them go away after a bit. 

Um... jumpscare warning I guess!
